mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(max(IMGREFDT) ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as lateststuff FROM CPP_IMG_PRODUCT_T WHERE INSTRUMENTMODE=4 AND PLATFORM=1

SELECT TO_CHAR(max(IMGREFDT) keep (dense_rank last order by IMGREFDT),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as lateststuff FROM CPP_RADIODETPARAM_V WHERE Detector=1 and Channel=1 and Name='SNR' AND PID=1 and INSTRUMENTMODE='LA'

SELECT TO_CHAR(max(IMGREFDT) keep (dense_rank last order by IMGREFDT),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as lateststuff FROM CPP_RADIODETPARAM_V WHERE Detector=1 and Channel=4 AND PID=1 and INSTRUMENTMODE='LA' AND INSTRUMENT='I' AND TID=7

SELECT TO_CHAR(max(IMGREFDT) keep (dense_rank last order by IMGREFDT),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as lateststuff FROM CPP_RADIODETPARAM_V WHERE Detector=1 and Channel=1 AND PID=1 and INSTRUMENTMODE='LA' AND INSTRUMENT='V' AND TID=25

SELECT TO_CHAR(max(IMGREFDT) keep (dense_rank last order by IMGREFDT),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as lateststuff FROM CPP_RADIODETPARAM_V WHERE Detector=1 and Channel=4 AND PID=1 and INSTRUMENTMODE='LA' AND INSTRUMENT='I' AND TID=31

SELECT TO_CHAR(max(IMGREFDT) keep (dense_rank last order by IMGREFDT),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as lateststuff FROM CPP_RADIODETPARAM_V WHERE Detector=1 and Channel=4 AND PID=1 and INSTRUMENTMODE='LA' AND TID=36
SELECT TO_CHAR(max(IMGREFDT) keep (dense_rank last order by IMGREFDT),'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as lateststuff FROM CPP_NAVPERFO_V WHERE IMGMODEID=4 AND PID=1
